title: Error Correction System (ECS) - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: MediationZone contains a storage repository called the Error Correction System (ECS), which is used for erroneous UDRs and batches. UDRs can be tagged with a configurable case and routed to an ECS Forwarding Agent for storage in ECS at any point in the mediation flow, as shown in the workflow below. Open Erroneous UDRs routed to ECS
